name: BowRoyale.io
description:
BowRoyale.io - Is a One Button Battle Royale Game of 16 players set in Medieval Times!

"The Archery Tournament for Ye'Olde Archery Lords and Ladies!"

=== Game Info ===
- Hold Spacebar to Aim then Release to Fire - Be the Last Lord or Lady standing to Win!
- Kill your Opponents and earn Victories to Unlock new Titles of Honour and Notoriety!

=== Links ===
- Homepage: https://bowroyale.io
- Visit us on Discord: https://discord.gg/sidequest
- Art Assets: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1QplSrqfnA9XUDyxdCxGDOlSBV8lyd32B
